GP10bhpc101u:349: ākṣiptacittāḥ pramadā ramāpates tās tā viceṣṭā jagṛhus tadātmikāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:350_0: gatyā cānurāgasmitābhyāṃ vibhramekṣitāni savilāsanirīkṣaṇāni taiś ca manoramā ālāpāś
GP10bhpc101u:350_1: ca vihārāḥ krīḍāś ca vibhramā anye ca vilāsās taiś ca ramāpater gatyādibhir etair
GP10bhpc101u:351: atas tasminn evātmā yāsāṃ tās tasya vividhāś ceṣṭhā jagṛhus tadanukaraṇenākrīḍan //BhPC_10,30.2//
GP10bhpc101u:354: asāv ahaṃ tv ity abalās tadātmikā nyavediṣuḥ kṛṣṇavihāravibhramāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:356: priyasya gatyādiṣu pratirūḍhā āviṣṭā mūrtayo yāsāṃ tāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:357: ataḥ kṛṣṇavihāra-vibhramāḥ kṛṣṇasya eva vihāravibhramāḥ krīḍāvilāsā yāsāṃ tāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:358: aham eva kṛṣṇa iti parasparaṃ niveditavatyaḥ //BhPC_10,30.3//
GP10bhpc101u:360: gāyantya uccair amum eva saṃhatā vicikyur unmattakavad vanād vanam /
GP10bhpc101u:361: papracchur ākāśavad antaraṃ bahir bhūteṣu santaṃ puruṣaṃ vanaspatīn //
GP10bhpc101u:365: bhūteṣv antaraṃ madhye santaṃ puruṣaṃ bahiś ca santam iti //BhPC_10,30.4//
GP10bhpc101u:367: dṛṣṭo vaḥ kaccid aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodha no manaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:369: tat prapañcayati navabhiḥ-tatra mahattvād ete paśyeyur ity āśayāśvatthādīn pṛcchanti-dṛṣṭa iti /
GP10bhpc101u:370: premahāsavilasitair avalokanair asmākaṃ mano hṛtvā cora iva gato vo yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃ dṛṣṭa iti //BhPC_10,30.5//
GP10bhpc101u:375: mahāntaḥ svapuṣpair bahūpakāriṇaś ceti kurabakādīn pṛcchanti-kaccid iti /
GP10bhpc101u:377: darpaharaṃ smitaṃ yasya saḥ ito gataḥ kaccid dṛṣṭa iti //BhPC_10,30.6//
GP10bhpc101u:381: alikulaiḥ saha tvā tvāṃ bibhrat tavātipriyas tvayā kiṃ dṛṣṭa iti //BhPC_10,30.7//
GP10bhpc101u:383: mālaty adarśi vaḥ kaccin mallike jātiyūthike /
GP10bhpc101u:384: prītiṃ vo janayan yātaḥ karasparśena mādhavaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:385: guṇātireke 'pi namratvād imāḥ paśyeyur iti pṛcchanti-mālatīti /
GP10bhpc101u:390: karasparśena vaḥ prītiṃ janayan kiṃ yāta iti /
GP10bhpc101u:394: ye 'nye parārthabhavakā yamunopakūlāḥ śaṃsantu kṛṣṇapadavīṃ rahitātmanāṃ naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:395: phalādibhiḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ saṃtarpakā ete paśyeyur iti pṛcchanti-cūteti /
GP10bhpc101u:398: ye 'nye ca parārthabhavakāḥ parārtham eva bhavo janma yeṣāṃ te /
GP10bhpc101u:401: te bhavanto rahitātmanāṃ śūnyacetasāṃ naḥ kṛṣṇapadavīṃ kṛṣṇasya mārgaṃ śaṃsantu kathayantu //BhPC_10,30.9//
GP10bhpc101u:403: kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghrisparśotsavotpulakitāṅgaruhair vibhāsi /
GP10bhpc101u:404: apy aṅghrisambhava urukramavikramād vā āho varāhavapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇena //
GP10bhpc101u:406: tvayā kiṃ tapaḥ kṛtaṃ yā tvaṃ keśavāṅghrisparśotsavā keśavasyāṅghrisparśenotsavo yasyāḥ sā /
GP10bhpc101u:409: tatra viśeṣaṃ pṛcchati-api kim ayam utsavo 'ṅghrisaṃbhavo 'dhunā tavaikadeśāṅghrisparśasaṃbhūtaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:410: yadvā naitāvat kintu urukramavikramāt pūrvam eva trivikramasya padā sarvākramaṇāt /
GP10bhpc101u:413: api tu tato 'pi pūrvaṃ varāhasya vapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇeneti /
GP10bhpc101u:414: atas tvayā nūnaṃ dṛṣṭas taṃ darśayeti //BhPC_10,30.10//
GP10bhpc101u:416: apy eṇapatny[*27] upagataḥ priyayeha gātrais tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi sunirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:417: kāntāṅgasaṅgakucakuṅkumarañjitāyāḥ kundasrajaḥ kulapater iha vāti gandhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:418: [*27] eṇapatnīti “patyur no yajñasaṃyoge” iti sūtrād eṇānāṃ bhavāntarayajñair yājñikatvaṃ /
GP10bhpc101u:424: priyayā saheti yad uktaṃ tatra dyotakam /
GP10bhpc101u:425: kāṇtāyā aṅgasaṅgas tena tatkucakuṅkumena rañjitāyāḥ kundakusumasrajo gandhaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:429: bāhuṃ priyāṃsa[*28] upadhāya gṛhītapadmo rāmānujas tulasikālikulair madāndhaiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:430: anvīyamāna iha vas taravaḥ praṇāmaṃ kiṃ vābhinandati caran praṇayāvalokaiḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:432: phalabhāreṇa natāṃs tarūn kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇatā iti matvā priyayā saha tasya gativilāsaṃ saṃbhāvayantyaḥ pṛcchanti-bāhum iti /
GP10bhpc101u:433: tulasikāyā alikulair atas tadāmodamadāndhair anvīyamāno 'nugamyamāna iha carann iti //BhPC_10,30.12//
GP10bhpc101u:435: pṛcchatemā latā bāhūn apy āśliṣṭā vanaspateḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:441: vanaspateḥ patyur bāhunāśliṣṭā api aho bhāgyaṃ nūnaṃ tan nakhaiḥ spṛṣṭā yata utpulakāni bibhrati /
GP10bhpc101u:442: na hi svapatisaṅgatāv īdṛkpulakasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ //BhPC_10,30.13//
GP10bhpc101u:445: līlā bhagavatas tās tā hy anucakrus tadātmikāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:446: unmattavat prapacchur ity etat prapañcitam idānīṃ-“ramāpates tās tā viceṣṭā jagṛhus tadātmikāḥ” iti yad uktaṃ tat prapañcayati-itīti /
GP10bhpc101u:447: unmattavaco gopyaḥ unmattavacasaś ca tā gopyaś ca /
GP10bhpc101u:453: kasyāścid ity ādibhiś caturbhir anukaraṇaṃ prapañcyate,
GP10bhpc101u:454: tataś caturbhis tanmayatvaṃ punar ekenānukaraṇam iti vivekaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:455: pūtanāyantyāḥ pūtanāvad ācarantyāḥ kṛṣṇavad ācarantī stanam apibat /
GP10bhpc101u:460: [*29] ghoṣāḥ kiṅkiṇyas tāsāṃ niḥsvanaiḥ sahitāvaṅghrī karṣantī satī riṅgayāmāsa /
GP10bhpc101u:462: daityāyitvā daityavat tṛṇāvartavad ātmānaṃ kṛtvā ekā kṛṣṇārbhabhāvanāṃ kṛṣṇasyārbhaṃ bālyaṃ bhāvayati yā tām anyāṃ jahāra //
GP10bhpc101u:465: āhūya dūragā yadvat kṛṣṇas tam anuvartatīm /
GP10bhpc101u:466: veṇuṃ kvaṇantīṃ krīḍantīm anyāḥ śaṃsanti sādhv iti //
GP10bhpc101u:468: yadvad yathā kṛṣṇas tathāhūya taṃ kṛṣṇam anuvartamānām /
GP10bhpc101u:472: mā bhaiṣṭa vātavarṣābhyāṃ tattrāṇaṃ vihitaṃ maya /
GP10bhpc101u:474: yatantī prayatnaṃ kurvatī ambaram uttarīyaṃ vastram unnidadhe ūrdhvaṃ dhṛtavatī //
GP10bhpc101u:478: cakṣūṃṣy āśv apidadhvaṃ vo vidhāsye kṣemam añjasā //
GP10bhpc101u:481: baddhānyayā srajā kācit tanvī tatra ulūkhale /
GP10bhpc101u:489: evaṃ punar api vṛndāvane latās tarūṃś ca kṛṣṇaṃ pṛcchantyo vanoddeśe vanapradeśe /
GP10bhpc101u:493: tais taiḥ padais tatpadavīm anvicchantyo 'grato' balāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:503: yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto yām anayad rahaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:507: yān brahmeśo ramā devī dadhur mūrdhny aghanuttaye[*30] //
GP10bhpc101u:512: asmābhir apy etad reṇvabhiṣekeṇa tathaiva kṛṣṇaḥ prāptuṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ //BhPC_10,30.29//
GP10bhpc101u:514: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ[*31] padāni yat /
GP10bhpc101u:520: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-bhaved[*33] evaṃ yadi tasyāḥ padāni saṃpṛktāni na bhaveyus tāni tu no duḥkhaṃ kurvantīti //BhPC_10,30.30//
GP10bhpc101u:521: [*33] yadi tasyāḥ padāni saṃpṛktāni na bhaveyus tarhi evaṃ kṛṣṇaprāptisādhanaṃ tatpadarajaḥsevanaṃ bhavet /
GP10bhpc101u:522: tāni nu saṃpṛktāni tatpadāni no duḥkhaṃ kurvanti /
GP10bhpc101u:523: tasyāḥ pādarajasā miśritatvāt kṛṣṇapādarajasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:525: na lakṣyante padāny atra tasyā nūnaṃ tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:527: tad asaṃpṛktān kevalaṃ kṛṣṇapādareṇūn eva vicinvatyas tān dṛṣṭvā punar atyantaṃ samatapan /
GP10bhpc101u:529: khidyatī sujāte sukumāre aṅghritale yasyās tām unninye skandham āropitavān //BhPC_10,30.31//
GP10bhpc101u:536: keśaprasādhanaṃ tv atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam /
GP10bhpc101u:537: tāni cūḍayatā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam //
GP10bhpc101u:539: kāntām adhikṛtya tāni prasūnāni cūḍayatā cūḍānukāreṇa badhnatā dhruvam upaviṣṭam //BhPC_10,30.33//
GP10bhpc101u:542: kāmināṃ darśayan dainyaṃ strīṇāṃ caiva durātmatām //
GP10bhpc101u:547: akhaṇḍitaḥ strīvibhramair anākṛṣṭo 'pi tathā cet kim iti reme 'ta āha-kāminām iti //
GP10bhpc101u:550: sā ca mene tadātmānaṃ variṣṭhaṃ sarvayoṣitām /
GP10bhpc101u:551: hitvā gopīḥ kāmayānā mām asau bhajate priyaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:553: kāmo yānam āgamanasādhanaṃ yāsāṃ tā gopīr hitvā māṃ bhajata iti hetor ātmānaṃ variṣṭhaṃ mene iti //
GP10bhpc101u:556: evam uktaḥ priyām āha skandha āruhyatām iti /
GP10bhpc101u:557: tataś cāntardadhe kṛṣṇaḥ sā vadhūr anvatapyata //
GP10bhpc101u:562: hā nātha ramaṇa preṣṭha kvāsi kvāsi mahābhuja /
GP10bhpc101u:563: dāsyās te kṛpaṇāyā me sakhe darśaya sannidhim //
GP10bhpc101u:572: tato 'viśan vanaṃ candra jyotsnā yāvad vibhāvyate /
GP10bhpc101u:573: tamaḥ praviṣṭam ālakṣya tato nivavṛtuḥ striyaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:574: tatas tayāpi sahitāḥ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇāya vanam aviśan /
GP10bhpc101u:579: evaṃ tam aprāptā api svagṛhān naiva smṛtavatyaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:585_0: kintu pūrvaṃ yatra śrīkṛṣṇena saṅgatir āsīt tad eva kālindyāḥ puliam āgatya kṛṣṇaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:585_1: bhāvayanti dhyāyantīti tathā tāḥ kṛṣṇasyāgamanaṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ militāḥ satyaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:586: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ triṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ **30**
GP10bhpc101u:591: jayati[*35] te 'dhikaṃ janmanā vrajaḥ śrayata indirā śaśvad atra hi /
GP10bhpc101u:592: dayita dṛśyatāṃ[*36] dikṣu tāvakās tvayi dhṛtāsavas tvāṃ vicinvate //
GP10bhpc101u:593_0: [*35] jayatītyādiślokeṣu prāyaścaturṇāṃ pādānāṃ dvitīyākṣarahalaikyaṃ keṣucit pādeṣu
GP10bhpc101u:593_1: prathamasaptamākṣarahalaikyaṃ tatra kvacit śasabavādīnām ālaṅkārikādisamayasiddhasāvarṇyād aikyam iti jñeyam /
GP10bhpc101u:594: [*36] tvayā dṛśyatāṃ pratyakṣībhūyatām iti preraṇātyāgenākarmakatvād bhāve loṭ /
GP10bhpc101u:595: yadvā asmābhir bhavān dṛśyatām iti karmaṇi loṭ /
GP10bhpc101u:597: te janmanā vrajo 'dhikaṃ yathā bhavati tathā jayaty utkarṣeṇa vartate /
GP10bhpc101u:598: yasmāt tvam atra jātas tasmad indirā lakṣmīr atra hi śrayate vrajam alaṅkṛtya vartate /
GP10bhpc101u:599: evaṃ vraje sarvasmin modamāne 'tra tu tāvakās tvadīyā gopījanās tvayi tvadartham eva kathañcid dhṛtā asavo yais te tvāṃ vicinvate /
GP10bhpc101u:602: yadvā evaṃ tvayā dṛṣyatām ete vicinvata iti //BhPC_31.1//
GP10bhpc101u:605: suratanātha te 'śulkadāsikā varada nighnato neha kiṃ vadhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:606: [*37] athavā dṛśaiva śulkadāsikāḥ dṛgrūpaśulkenaiva dāsīr api tyāgena mārayataḥ iti yojanā /
GP10bhpc101u:607: atra svatantrāṇāṃ bāhūnāṃ vaktṛtvād aparā āhur iti sarvaślokeṣv avatāraṇā,
GP10bhpc101u:609: tatra vicinvantu mama kim iti cet tatrāhuḥ-śaradeti /
GP10bhpc101u:610_0: śarad udāśaye śaratkālīne sarasi sādhu jātaṃ samyak jātaṃ yat sarasijaṃ vikasitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:610_1: padmaṃ tasyodare garbhe yā śrīs tāṃ muṣṇāti haratīti tathā tayā dṛśā netreṇa he suratanātha
GP10bhpc101u:611: aśulkadāsikā amūlyadāsīr no nighnato mārayatas te tava tvayā kriyamāṇa iha loke 'yaṃ vadho na bhavati kim /
GP10bhpc101u:612: śastreṇaiva vadho vadhaḥ kiṃ dṛśā vadho na bhavati,
GP10bhpc101u:614: atas tava dṛśā 'pahṛtaprāṇapratyarpaṇāya tvayā dṛśyatām iti bhāvaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:615: tvayā dṛśyatām iti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvatra vākyaśeṣaḥ //BhPC_31.2//
GP10bhpc101u:618: vṛṣamayātmajād[*38] viśvato bhayād ṛṣabha te vayaṃ rakṣitā muhuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:621: taccaritram agre vakṣyamāṇam api rāsāt pūrvabhāvīti jñeyam /
GP10bhpc101u:622: kiṃ ca bahubhyo mṛtyubhyaḥ kṛpayā rakṣitvā kimitīdānīṃ dṛśā manmathaṃ preṣya ghātayasīty āhuḥ-viṣeti /
GP10bhpc101u:624_0: viṣamayāj jalādyo 'pyayo nāśas tasmāt tathā vyālarākṣasād aghāsurād varṣān mārutād
GP10bhpc101u:624_1: vaidyutānalād aśanipātāt vṛṣo 'ṛṣṭas[*39] tasmān mayātmajād vyomād viśvato 'nyasmād
GP10bhpc101u:624_2: api sarvato bhayāc ca kāliyadamanādinā rakṣitāḥ kim idānīm upekṣasa iti bhāvaḥ //BhPC_31.3 //
GP10bhpc101u:626: na khalu gopīkānandano bhavān akhiladehinām antarātmadṛk /
GP10bhpc101u:627: vikhanasārthito viśvaguptaye sakha udeyivān sātvatāṃ kule //
GP10bhpc101u:628: [*39] ariṣṭavyomāsurayor vadhasya bhāvitve 'pi gargādimukhāc chrutatvena vipralambapoṣakatvena vā bhūtavan nirdeśaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:629: api ca viśvapālanāyāvatīrṇasya tava bhaktopekṣā 'tyantam anucitety āśayenāhuḥ-na khalv iti /
GP10bhpc101u:630: he sakhe, bhavān khalu niścitaṃ yaśodāsuto na bhavati,
GP10bhpc101u:632: nanu sa kiṃ dṛśyo bhavati tatrāhuḥ-vikhanasā brahmaṇā viśvapālanāya prārthitaḥ sansātvatāṃ kule udeyivān udita iti //BhPC_31.4//
GP10bhpc101u:634: viracitābhayaṃ vṛṣṇidhūrya te caraṇam[*40] īyuṣāṃ saṃsṛter bhayāt /
GP10bhpc101u:635: karasaroruhaṃ kānta[*41] kāmadaṃ śirasi dhehi naḥ śrīkaragraham //
GP10bhpc101u:637: [*41] yadvā kāntaṃ ca tatkāmadaṃ ceti svataḥ sukharūpam abhīṣṭadaṃ ceti kecit /
GP10bhpc101u:638: tasmāt tvadbhaktānām asmākam etat prārthanācatuṣṭayaṃ saṃpādayety āhuḥ-viracitābhayam ity ādi caturbhiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:640: saṃsṛter bhayāt te caraṇam īyuṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptānāṃ prāṇināṃ viracitaṃ dattam abhayaṃ yena tat tathā he kānta,
GP10bhpc101u:641: kāmadaṃ varadaṃ tathā śriyaḥ karaṃ gṛhṇātīti tathā tad bhavatkarasaroruhaṃ na śirasi dehi //BhPC_31.5//
GP10bhpc101u:644: bhaja sakhe bhavatkiṅkarīḥ[*42] sma no jalaruhānanaṃ cāru darśaya //
GP10bhpc101u:649: nija janānāṃ yaḥ smayo garvas tasya dhvaṃsanaṃ nāśakaṃ smitaṃ yasya tathābhūta he sakhe,
GP10bhpc101u:652: prathamaṃ tāvaj jalaruhānanaṃ cāru yoṣitāṃ no darśaya //BhPC_31.6//
GP10bhpc101u:655: phaṇiphaṇārpitaṃ[*43] te padāmbujaṃ kṛṇu kuceṣu naḥ kṛndhi hṛcchayam //
GP10bhpc101u:656: [*43] phaṇinaḥ phaṇāsv arpaṇamātreṇa tadviṣadarpasyeva hṛdi sparśamātreṇa kandarpasya nāśo na duṣkara iti bhāvaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:657_0: aviśeṣeṇa praṇatāṇāṃ dehināṃ pāpakarśanaṃ pāpahantṛ tṛṇacarān paśūn apy anu gacchati
GP10bhpc101u:657_1: kṛpayeti tathā saubhāgyena śriyo niketanaṃ vīryātirekeṇa phaṇinaḥ phanāsv arpitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:657_2: te padāmbujaṃ naḥ kuceṣu kṛṇu kuru /
GP10bhpc101u:662: vidhikarīr[*44] imā vīra muhyatīr adharasīdhunāpyāyayasva naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:663: [*44] yadvā giraiva vidhikarīr adhunā virahāt saṃmuhyatīḥ imāḥ pratyakṣāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:665: tavaiva madhurayā girā valgūni vākyāni yasyāṃ tayā budhānāṃ manojñayā hṛdyayā gambhīrayety arthaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:666: muhyatīr imā no vidhikarīḥ kiṅkarīr adharasīdhunā āpyāyayasva saṃjīvayeti //BhPC_31.8//
GP10bhpc101u:668: tava kathāmṛtaṃ[*45] taptajīvanaṃ kavibhir īḍitaṃ kalmaṣāpaham /
GP10bhpc101u:669: śravaṇamaṅgalaṃ śrīmad ātataṃ bhuvi gṛṇanti te bhūridā janāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:670: [*45] yadvā santaptā āhuḥ-tava kathā eva ṃrtaṃ mṛtiḥ saivoddīpanavidhayāsmān mārayati /
GP10bhpc101u:671: tathā taptajīvanaṃ tapte taile jīvanam ivety arthaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:672: tathā ca ye 'smat purato gṛṇanti te bhūridā mahāghātakāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:675: kiṃ ca asmākaṃ tvadvirahe prāptam eva mataṇaṃ kintu tvatkathāmṛtaṃ pāyayadbhiḥ sukṛtibhir vañcitam ity āhuḥ-taveti /
GP10bhpc101u:678: prasiddhāmṛtād utkarṣam āhuḥ-kavibhir brahmavidbhir apīḍitaṃ stutam /
GP10bhpc101u:686: evaṃbhūtaṃ tvatkathāmṛtam ātataṃ yathā bhavati tathā ye bhuvi gṛṇanti nirūpayanti te janā bhūridā bahudātāraḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:688: yadvā evaṃbhūtaṃ tvatkathāmṛtaṃ ye bhuvi gṛṇanti te bhūridāḥ pūrvajanmasu bahu dattavantaḥ sukṛtina ity arthaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:689: etad uktaṃ bhavati-ye kevalaṃ kathāmṛtaṃ gṛṇanti te 'pi tāvad atidhanyāḥ kiṃ punar ye tvāṃ paśyanti,
GP10bhpc101u:692: prahasitaṃ priya premavīkṣaṇaṃ viharaṇaṃ ca te dhyānamaṅgalam[*46] /
GP10bhpc101u:693: rahasi saṃvido yā hṛdi spṛśaḥ kuhaka no manaḥ kṣobhayanti hi //
GP10bhpc101u:696: nanu matkathāśravaṇenaiva nirvṛtā bhavata kiṃ maddarśanena,
GP10bhpc101u:698: tvadvilāsakṣubhitacittā vayaṃ tatrāpi śāntiṃ na vindāma ity āhuḥ-prahasitam iti /
GP10bhpc101u:702: calasi yad vrajāc cārayan paśūn nalinasundaraṃ nātha te padam /
GP10bhpc101u:703: śilatṛṇāṅkuraiḥ sīdatīti naḥ kalilatāṃ manaḥ kānta gacchati //
GP10bhpc101u:704: kiṃ ca tvayi vayam atipremārdracittās tvaṃ punar asmāsu kena hetunā kapaṭam ācarasīty āhuḥ ślokadvayena-calasīti /
GP10bhpc101u:706_0: yat yadā vrajāc calasi paśūṃś cārayaṃs tadā tan nalinasundaraṃ komalaṃ te padaṃ śilaiḥ
GP10bhpc101u:706_1: kaṇiśais tṛṇair aṅkuraiś ca sīdati kliśyed iti no manaḥ kalilatām asvāsthyaṃ gacchati prāpnoti /
GP10bhpc101u:710: ghanarajasvalaṃ darśayan muhur manasi naḥ smaraṃ vīra yacchasi //
GP10bhpc101u:711_0: tvaṃ tu dinaparikṣaye sāyaṃ kāle nīlakuntalair āvṛtaṃ ghanarajasvalaṃ gorajaś churitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:711_1: vanaruhānanam alimālākulaparāgacchuritapadmatulyam ānanaṃ bibhrat tac ca muhur muhur
GP10bhpc101u:711_2: darśayan no manasi kevalaṃ smaraṃ[*47] yacchasy arpayasi /
GP10bhpc101u:712: na tu saṅgaṃ dadāsīti kapaṭas tvam iti bhāvaḥ //BhPC_31.12//
GP10bhpc101u:716: caraṇapaṅkajaṃ śantamaṃ ca te ramaṇa naḥ staneṣv arpayādhihan //
GP10bhpc101u:718: ato 'dhunā kapaṭaṃ vihāyaivaṃ kurv iti prārthayanti ślokadvayena-praṇatakāmadam iti /
GP10bhpc101u:720: padmajena brahmaṇārcitam āpadi dhyeyaṃ dhyānamātreṇāpannivartakaṃ śantamaṃ ca sevāsamaye 'pi sukhatamaṃ te caraṇapaṅkajaṃ kāmatāpaśāntaye naḥ staneṣv arpayeti //BhPC_31.13//
GP10bhpc101u:723: itararāgavismāraṇaṃ nṛṇāṃ[*49] vitara vīra nas te 'dharāmṛtam //
GP10bhpc101u:728: svaritena nāditena veṇunā suṣṭhu cumbitam iti nādāmṛtavāsitam iti bhāvaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:729: itararāgavismāraṇaṃ nṛṇām itareṣu sārvabhaumādisukheṣu rāgam icchāṃ vismārayati vilāpayatīti tathā tat //BhPC_31.14//
GP10bhpc101u:731: aṭati yad bhavān ahni kānanaṃ truṭir yugāyate tvām apaśyatām /
GP10bhpc101u:732: kuṭilakuntalaṃ śrīmukhaṃ ca te jaḍa[*50] udīkṣatāṃ pakṣmakṛd dṛśām //
GP10bhpc101u:734: yaḥ pakṣmāṇi kṛntati sa nimīlanābhāvasaṃpādaka eva ajaḍo rasajñaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:735: kiṃ vā svadṛśāṃ pakṣmacchideva ajaḍaḥ udīkṣatāṃ uccaiḥ paśyatu /
GP10bhpc101u:736: vayaṃ tu pakṣmapihitadṛśo jaḍāḥ kiṃ paśyāmeti darśane 'pi vidhāna duḥkham iti bhāvaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:737: kiṃ ca kṣaṇam api tvadadarśane duḥkhaṃ darśane ca sukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvasaṅgaparityāgena yataya iva vayaṃ truṭiḥ kṣaṇārdham api yugavad bhavati /
GP10bhpc101u:739: punaś ca kathañcid dinānte te tava śrīman mukham uduccair īkṣamānānāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣāṃ pakṣmakṛd brahmā jaḍo manda eva /
GP10bhpc101u:740: nimeṣamātram apy antaram asahyam iti darśane sukham uktam //BhPC_31.15//
GP10bhpc101u:743: gatividas tavodgītamohitāḥ kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi //
GP10bhpc101u:745: patīn sutān anvayāṃs tatsaṃbandhino bhrātṝn bāndhavāṃś cātivilaṅghya tava samīpam āgatā vayam /
GP10bhpc101u:750: tavodgītenoccair gītena mohitāḥ he kitava śaṭha,
GP10bhpc101u:751: evaṃbhūtā yoṣito niśi svayam āgatās tvām ṛte kas tyajet /
GP10bhpc101u:755: bṛhaduraḥ śriyo vīkṣya dhāma te muhur atispṛhā[*52] muhyate manaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:761: yadvā spṛheti saṃpadāditvād bhāve kvipi tṛtīyā /
GP10bhpc101u:764: atas tvayā tyaktānām asmākaṃ prāktanatvaddarśananidānahṛdrogasya tvatsaṅgatyaiva cikitsāṃ kurvityāśayenāhur dvayena-rahasīti /
GP10bhpc101u:765: śriyo dhāma te bṛhad viśālam uraś ca vīkṣyātispṛhā bhavati /
GP10bhpc101u:766: tathā ca muhur muhur mano muhyati //BhPC_31.17//
GP10bhpc101u:768: vrajavanaukasāṃ[*53] vyaktir aṅga te vṛjinahantry alaṃ viśvamaṅgalam /
GP10bhpc101u:769: tyaja manāk ca nas tvatspṛhātmanāṃ svajanahṛdrujāṃ yan niṣūdanam //
GP10bhpc101u:771: tava ca vyaktir abhivyaktir vrajavanaukasāṃ sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa vṛjinahantrī duḥkhanirasanīti viśvamaṅgalaṃ sarvamaṅgalarūpā ca /
GP10bhpc101u:772: atas tvatspṛhātmanāṃ tvatspṛhārūḍhamanasāṃ no manāg īṣat kim api tyaja muñca /
GP10bhpc101u:775: svajanahṛdrogāṇāṃ yad atigopyaṃ niṣūdanaṃ nivartakam auṣadhaṃ tat tvam eva vetasīti gūḍhābhiprāyam //BhPC_31.18//
GP10bhpc101u:777: yat te sujātacaraṇāmburuhaṃ staneṣu bhītāḥ śanaiḥ priya dadhīmahi karkaśeṣu /
GP10bhpc101u:778: tenāṭavīm aṭasi tad vyathate na kiṃ svit kūrpādibhir bhramati dhīr bhavadāyuṣāṃ naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:780: he priya, yat te tava sukumāraṃ padābjaṃ kaṭhineṣu kuceṣu saṃmardanaśaṅkitāḥ śanair dadhīmahi[*54] dhārayema vayam /
GP10bhpc101u:782: “nayasi” iti pāṭhe paśūn vā kāñcid anyāṃ vā ātmānam eva vā nayasi prāpayasi /
GP10bhpc101u:783_0: tat tataḥ tat padāmbujaṃ vā kūrpādibhiḥ sūkṣmapāṣāṇādibhiḥ kiṃ svin na vyathate kathaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:783_1: nu nāma na vyatheteti bhavān[*55] evāyur jīvanaṃ yāsāṃ tāsāṃ no dhīr bhramati muhyatīti //BhPC_31.19 //
GP10bhpc101u:787: ittham eva ca “tvayi dhṛtāsavaḥ” ity upakramo 'pi /
GP10bhpc101u:788: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ ekatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **31**
GP10bhpc101u:792: sad ayaṃ nandayan gopīr udgato nandanandanaḥ // 2 //
GP10bhpc101u:794: iti gopyaḥ pragāyantyaḥ pralapantyaś ca citradhā /
GP10bhpc101u:798: citradhā anekadhā susvaram uccaiḥ kṛṣṇadarśane lālasātispṛhā yāsāṃ tāḥ //BhPC_10,32.1//
GP10bhpc101u:802: sākṣān manmathamanmatho jaganmohanasya kāmasyāpi manasy udbhūtaḥ kāmaḥ sākṣāt tasyāpi mohaka ity arthaḥ //BhPC_10,32.2//
GP10bhpc101u:805: uttasthur yugapat sarvās tanvaḥ prāṇam ivāgatam //
GP10bhpc101u:815_0: bhrukuṭiṃ bhruvam ābadhya kuṭilīkṛtya premasaṃrambheṇa praṇayakopāveśena vihvalā
GP10bhpc101u:815_1: vivaśā daṣṭādharoṣṭhā kaṭāḥ kaṭākṣās tair ye ākṣepāḥ paribhavās tais tāḍayantīvaikṣat //BhPC_10,32.6 //
GP10bhpc101u:818: āpītam api nātṛpyat santas[*56] taccaraṇaṃ yathā //
GP10bhpc101u:820: animiṣantībhyām animīlantībhyāṃ dṛgbhyām āpītam api samyag dṛṣṭam api punaḥ punar juṣāṇā nātṛpyat //BhPC_10,32.7//
GP10bhpc101u:822: taṃ kācin netrarandhreṇa hṛdi kṛtya nimīlya ca /
GP10bhpc101u:828: jahur virahajaṃ tāpaṃ prājñaṃ prāpya yathā janāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:829: prājñaṃ īśvaraṃ prāpya yathā mumukṣavo janāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:830: yadvā prājñaṃ brahmajñaṃ prāpya yathā saṃsāriṇaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:831: yadvā prājñaṃ sauṣuptaṃ[*58] prāpya yathā viśvataijasāvasthā jīvāḥ //BhPC_10,32.9//
GP10bhpc101u:838: yadvā puruṣo 'nuśāyī prakṛtyādyupādhibhir vṛto yathā 'dhikaṃ virocate tadvat //BhPC_10,32.10//
GP10bhpc101u:840: tāḥ samādāya kālindyā nirviśya[*59] pulinaṃ vibhuḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:843: vikasatkundamandāraiḥ surabhir yo 'nilas tasmāt ṣaṭpadā yasmiṃs tat //BhPC_10,32.11//
GP10bhpc101u:847: śaraccandrāṃśūnāṃ sandohaiḥ samūhair dhvastaṃ doṣātamo rātrigataṃ tamo yasmiṃs tat /
GP10bhpc101u:849: hastarūpais taralais taraṅgair ācitā āstṛtā komalā vālukā yasmin /
GP10bhpc101u:850: evaṃbhūtaṃ pulinaṃ tāḥ samādāya nirviśya tābhir vṛto 'dhikaṃ vyarocateti pūrveṇānvayaḥ //BhPC_10,32.12//
GP10bhpc101u:853: svair uttarīyaiḥ kucakuṅkumāṅkitair acīk pann āsanam ātmabandhave //
GP10bhpc101u:854: tāś ca manorathānām antaṃ yayuḥ pūrṇakāmā babhūvuḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:856: ayam arthaḥ-yathā karmakāṇḍe śrutayaḥ parameśvaram apaśyantyas tat tatkāmānubandhair apūrṇā iva bhavanti,
GP10bhpc101u:857: jñānakāṇḍe tu parameśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadāhlādapūrṇāḥ kāmānubandhaṃ jahati tadvad iti /
GP10bhpc101u:858: āptakāmā api premṇā tam abhajann ity āha-svair iti /
GP10bhpc101u:866: gopīsabhāgatas tābhiḥ saṃmānitaḥ san cakāsa śuśubhe /
GP10bhpc101u:867: trailokye yā lakṣmīḥ śobhā tasyā ekam eva padaṃ sthānaṃ tadvapur dadhad darśayan //BhPC_10,32.14//
GP10bhpc101u:872: sahāsalīlekṣaṇena vibhramo vilāso yasyāṃ tayā bhruvopalakṣitāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:877: nobhayāṃś[*63] ca bhajanty eka etan no brūhi sādhu bhoḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:879: tatra bhagavato 'kṛtajñatāṃ tadvacanenaivāpādayitukāmā gūḍhābhiprāyā lokavṛttāntam iva pṛcchanti-bhajata iti /
GP10bhpc101u:883: kecid etad viparyayaṃ yathā bhavati tathā /
GP10bhpc101u:889: mitho bhajanti ye sakhyaḥ svārthaikāntodyamā hi te /
GP10bhpc101u:890: na tatra sauhṛdaṃ dharmaḥ svārthārthaṃ tad dhi nānyathā[*65] //
GP10bhpc101u:893: he sakhyaḥ, upakārapratyupakāratayā ye mitho bhajanti te 'nyaṃ na bhajanti kiṃ tv ātmānam eva /
GP10bhpc101u:895: hi yasmāt svārtha[*66] evaikānta udyamo yeṣāṃ te /
GP10bhpc101u:896: tatra ca na[*67] sauhṛdam ato na sukhaṃ,
GP10bhpc101u:897: na ca dharmo dṛṣṭoddeśād gomahiṣyādibhajanavad ity arthaḥ //BhPC_10,32.17//
GP10bhpc101u:901: bhajanty abhajato ye vai karuṇāḥ pitaro yathā /
GP10bhpc101u:905: ye tv abhajato bhajanti te dvividhāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:907: tatra tu yathākramaṃ dharmakāmau bhavata ity āha-bhajanty abhajata iti //BhPC_10,32.18//
GP10bhpc101u:909: bhajato 'pi na vai kecid bhajanty abhajataḥ kutaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:916: anye tu gurudruho 'tikaṭhināḥ “sa pitā yas tu poṣakaḥ” iti nyāyād upakartā gurutulyas tasmai druhyantīti tathā te //BhPC_10,32.19//
GP10bhpc101u:918: nāhaṃ tu sakhyo bhajato 'pi jantūn bhajāmy amīṣām anuvṛttivṛttaye /
GP10bhpc101u:919: yathādhano labdhadhane vinaṣṭe taccintayānyan nibhṛto na veda //
GP10bhpc101u:921: akṣisaṃkocaiḥ parasparaṃ gūḍhasmitamukhīs tā dṛṣṭvā āha-nāhaṃ tv iti /
GP10bhpc101u:922: he sakhyaḥ, ahaṃ teṣāṃ madhye na ko 'pi,
GP10bhpc101u:925: amīṣāṃ bhajatām anuvṛttivṛtaye nirantaradhyānapravṛttyarthaṃ tān na bhajāmi /
GP10bhpc101u:931: evaṃ madarthojjhitalokavedasvānāṃ hi vo mayy anuvṛttaye 'balāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:932: mayā parokṣaṃ bhajatā tirohitaṃ māsūyituṃ mārhatha tat priyaṃ priyāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:933: evaṃ madarthojjhitalokavedasvānāṃ madarthe ujjhito loko yuktāyuktāpratīkṣaṇāt,
GP10bhpc101u:935: svā jñātayaś ca snehatyāgāt yābhis tāsāṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ parokṣam adarśanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā bhajatā yuṣmat premālāpān śṛṇvataiva tirohitam antardhānena sthitam /
GP10bhpc101u:936: tat tasmāt he abalā he priyāḥ,
GP10bhpc101u:937: mā mām[*69] asūyituṃ doṣāropeṇa draṣṭuṃ yūyaṃ mārhatha na yogyāḥ stha //BhPC_10,32.21//
GP10bhpc101u:939: tathāpi priyaṃ mallakṣaṇam asūyituṃ mārhatheti mā /
GP10bhpc101u:942: na pāraye 'haṃ niravadyasaṃyujāṃ svasādhukṛtyaṃ vibudhāyuṣāpi vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:943: yā mābhajan durjaragehaśṛṅkhalāḥ[*70] saṃvṛścya tad vaḥ pratiyātu sādhunā //
GP10bhpc101u:945: āstām idaṃ, paramarthaṃ tu śṛṇutety āha-neti /
GP10bhpc101u:946: niravadyā saṃyuk saṃyogo yāsāṃ tāsāṃ vo vibudhānām[*71] āyuṣāpi cirakāle 'pi svīyaṃ sādhu kṛtyaṃ pratyupakāraṃ kartuṃ na pāraye na śaknomi /
GP10bhpc101u:948: yā bhavatyo durjarā ajarā yā gehaśṛṅkhalās tāḥ saṃvṛścya niḥśeṣaṃ chittvā mā mām abhajaṃs tāsām /
GP10bhpc101u:950: tasmād vo yuṣmākam eva sādhunā sādhukṛtyena tat yuṣmat sādhu kṛtyaṃ pratiyātu pratikṛtaṃ bhavatu /
GP10bhpc101u:953: [*71] yadvā vigato budho gaṇanābhijño yasmāt tenānantenāyuṣāpi /
GP10bhpc101u:954: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **32**
GP10bhpc101u:959: itthaṃ bhagavato gopyaḥ śrutvā vācaḥ supeśalāḥ[*72] /
GP10bhpc101u:963: yadvā tasya bhagavato 'ṅgena vapuṣā karacaraṇādyavayavair vopacitāḥ samṛddhā āśiṣo yāsāṃ[*73] tāḥ //BhPC_10,33.1//
GP10bhpc101u:964: [*73] yadvā tāsāṃ gopīnām aṅgair upacitā āśiṣo yasya /
GP10bhpc101u:968: rāsakrīḍāṃ rāso[*74] nāma bahunartakīyukto nṛtyaviśeṣas tāṃ krīḍām /
GP10bhpc101u:969: anyonyam ābaddhāḥ saṃgrathitā bāhavo yais taiḥ saha //BhPC_10,33.2//
GP10bhpc101u:975: yogeśvareṇa kṛṣṇena[*75] tāsāṃ madhye dvayor dvayoḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:980: tatsāhityam abhinayena darśayati-rāsotsava ity akṣaracatuṣṭayādhikena sārdhena /
GP10bhpc101u:981: tāsāṃ maṇḍalarūpeṇāvasthitānāṃ dvayor dvayor madhye praviṣṭena tenaiva kaṇṭhe gṛhītānām ubhayata āliṅgitānām /
GP10bhpc101u:983: yaṃ sarvāḥ striyaḥ svanikaṭaṃ mām evāśliṣṭavān iti manyeraṃs tena etad arthaṃ dvayor dvayor madhye praviṣṭenety arthaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:985: sarvasannihitatve vā kutaḥ svaikanikaṭatvābhimānas tāsām ity ata uktaṃ-yogeśvareṇeti /
GP10bhpc101u:990: tāvat tatkṣaṇam evautsukyavyāptamanasāṃ sastrīkāṇāṃ devānāṃ vimānaśataiḥ saṅkulaṃ saṅkīrṇaṃ nabho babhūva //BhPC_10,33.4//
GP10bhpc101u:994: tat tasya bhagavataḥ śrīkṛṣṇasyāmalaṃ nirmalaṃ yaśo jagur iti //BhPC_10,33.5//
GP10bhpc101u:1003: mahāmarakato nīlamaṇir iva haimānāṃ maṇīnāṃ madhye madhye tābhiḥ svarṇavarṇābhir āśliṣṭābhiḥ śuśubhe /
GP10bhpc101u:1009: gāyantyas taṃ taḍita iva tā meghacakre virejuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1011: tathā tā api tena virejur ity āha-pādanyāsair iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1012: bhujavidhutibhiḥ karacālanair bhajyamānair madhyaiś caladbhiḥ kucaiś ca paṭaiś ca /
GP10bhpc101u:1014: svidyan mukhyaḥ svidyanti svedam udgiranti mukhāni yāsāṃ tāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1015: kabareṣu raśanāsu ca granthayo dṛḍhā yāsām /
GP10bhpc101u:1019: tās tu bahuvidhās taḍita iva svedas tuṣāra iva,
GP10bhpc101u:1033: unninye pūjitā tena prīyatā sādhu sādhv iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1034: tad eva dhruvam unninye tasyai mānaṃ ca bahv adāt //
GP10bhpc101u:1037: prīyamāṇena saṃmānitā tajjāty unnayanam eva dhruvaṃ dhruvākhyaṃ tālaviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā unninye unnītavatī //BhPC_10,33.10//
GP10bhpc101u:1041: evaṃ nṛtyagītādinā śrīkṛṣṇasaṃmānitānāṃ tāsām atiprītivilasitaṃ vṛttam āha-kācid iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1042: ślathanti valayāni mallikāś ca yasyāḥ sā //BhPC_10,33.11//
GP10bhpc101u:1050: nāṭyena nṛtyena vikṣiptayoś cañcalayoḥ kuṇḍalayos[*77] tviṣeṇa tviṣā maṇḍitaṃ gaṇḍaṃ kapolaṃ tathābhūte svagaṇḍe saṃdadhatyāḥ saṃyojayantyāḥ //BhPC_10,33.13//
GP10bhpc101u:1051: [*77] nṛtyena vikṣipte cañcale kuṇḍale ca svābhāvikī gaṇḍatviṭ ca tatsamāhāras tviṣaṃ tena maṇḍitam iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1056: kūjatī nūpure mekhalā ca yasyāḥ sā //BhPC_10,33.14//
GP10bhpc101u:1060: evam anyā api gopyo yathā yathaṃ nānāvibhramair vijahrur ity āha-gopya iti //BhPC_10,33.15//
GP10bhpc101u:1063: gopyaḥ samaṃ bhagavatā nanṛtuḥ svakeśasrastasrajo bhramaragāyakarāsagoṣṭhyām //
GP10bhpc101u:1064: tatra vādakeṣu gāyakeṣu gandharvakinnarādiṣu rasāveśena muhyatsu cānyām eva vādyādi-sampattiṃ darśayan rāsasaṃbhramam āha-karṇotpalair iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1065: karṇotpalaiś cālakaviṭaṅkair alakālaṅkṛtaiḥ kapolaiś ca gharmaiś ca vaktreṣu śrīḥ śobhā yāsāṃ tāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1067: valayanūpuraghoṣair vādyair vāditraiḥ svakeśebhyaḥ srastāḥ srajo yāsāṃ tāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1068: etena tālagatisaṃtuṣṭāḥ keśāḥ saśiraḥkampaṃ pādeṣu puṣpavṛṣṭim ivākurvann ity utprekṣitam /
GP10bhpc101u:1075: yathā gopyo nānāvibhramair bhagavatā saha vijahrur evaṃ bhagavān api svavilāsais tābhiḥ saha rema ity āha-evam iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1077: svapratibimbair vibhramaḥ krīḍā yasya sa iva /
GP10bhpc101u:1078: anenaitad darśitam-svīyam eva sarvakalākauśalaṃ saugandhyalāvaṇyamādhuryādi ca tāsu sañcārya tābhiḥ saha reme yathārbhakaḥ svapratibimbair iti //BhPC_10,33.17//
GP10bhpc101u:1081: nāñjaḥ prativyoḍhum alaṃ vrajastriyo visrastamālābharaṇāḥ kurūdvaha //
GP10bhpc101u:1082: tās tu bhagavadvilāsair ākulā babhūvur ity āha-tadaṅgeti /
GP10bhpc101u:1083: tasyāṅgasaṅgena prakṛṣṭām utprītis tayā ākulāny avaśānīndriyāṇi yāsāṃ tāḥ viślathabandhān keśādīn añjasā[*78] prativyoḍhuṃ yathāpūrvaṃ dhartuṃ nālaṃ na samarthā babhūvuḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1084: visrastā mālā ābharaṇāni ca yāsāṃ tāḥ //BhPC_10,33.18//
GP10bhpc101u:1089: na kevalaṃ tā evākulendriyāḥ kintu devyo 'pīty āha-kṛṣṇavikrīḍitam iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1091: anenaitat sūcitam-śaśāṅkena vismitena gatau vismṛtāyā tataḥ prāktanāḥ sarve 'pi grahās tatra tatraiva tasthus tataś cātidīrghāsu rātriṣu yathāsukhaṃ vijahrur iti //BhPC_10,33.19//
GP10bhpc101u:1094: reme sa bhagavāṃs tābhir ātmārāmo 'pi līlayā //
GP10bhpc101u:1097: nandagopasutaṃ devi patiṃ me kuru te namaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1098: “[*79] iti pratyekaṃ tābhiḥ prārthanād bhagavatāpi-“yātābalā vrajaṃ siddhā mayemā raṃsyatha kṣapāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1099: “[*80] iti tathaiva pratiśrutatvāt tāvantam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā reme iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1110: mānaṃ dadhatya ṛṣabhasya jaguḥ kṛtāni puṇyāni tatkararuhasparśapramodāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1112_0: sphuratāṃ svarṇakuṇḍalānāṃ kuntalānāṃ ca tviṣā gaṇḍeṣu yā śrīs tayā sudhitenāmṛtāyitena
GP10bhpc101u:1112_1: hāsasahitena nirīkṣaṇena ca ṛṣabhasya patyuḥ kṛṣṇasya mānaṃ dadhatyaḥ pūjāṃ kurvatyas tatkarmāṇi jaguḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1113: tasya kararuhair nakhaiḥ sparśena pramodo yāsāṃ tāḥ //BhPC_10,33.22//
GP10bhpc101u:1115: tābhir yutaḥ śramam apohitum aṅgasaṅgaghṛṣṭasrajaḥ sa[*82] kucakuṅkumarañjitāyāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1116: gandharvapālibhir anudruta āviśad vāḥ śrānto gajībhir ibharāḍ iva bhinnasetuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1119_0: tāsām aṅgasaṅgena ghṛṣṭā saṃmarditā yā srak tasyāḥ ata eva tāsāṃ kucakuṅkumena rañjitāyāḥ
GP10bhpc101u:1119_1: saṃbandhibhir gandharvapālibhir gandharvapā gandharvapataya iva gāyanto yo 'layas
GP10bhpc101u:1119_2: tair anudruto 'nugataḥ sa kṛṣṇo vāḥ udakam āviśat /
GP10bhpc101u:1122: so 'mbhasy alaṃ yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ premṇekṣitaḥ[*83] prahasatībhir itas tato 'ṅga /
GP10bhpc101u:1123: vaimānikaiḥ kusumavarṣibhir īdyamāno reme svayaṃ svaratir[*84] atra gajendralīlaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1127: kiṃ vā svā asādhāraṇī ratir jalakrīḍā yasya /
GP10bhpc101u:1131: cacāra bhṛṅgapramadāgaṇāvṛto yathā madacyud dviradaḥ kareṇubhiḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1133: yamunāyā upavane jalasthalaprasūnānāṃ gandho yasmiṃs tenānilena juṣṭāni diśāṃ taṭāny antā yasmin /
GP10bhpc101u:1134: yadvā diśaś ca taṭaṃ sthalaṃ ca yasminn upavane /
GP10bhpc101u:1140: sa kṛṣṇaḥ satyasaṅkalpo 'nurāgistrīkadambastha evaṃ sarvā niśāḥ sevitavān /
GP10bhpc101u:1141: śaratkāvyakathārasāśrayāḥ śaradi bhavāḥ kāvyeṣu kathyamānā ye rasās teṣām āśrayabhūtā niśāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1143: śṛṅgārarasāśrayāḥ śaradi[*85] prasiddhāḥ kāvyeṣu yāḥ kathās tāḥ siṣeve iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1144: evam apy ātmany evāvaruddhaḥ saurataś caramadhātur na tu skhalito yasyeti kāmajayoktiḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1146: [*85] śaratkāvyakathāḥ śaradi sarvadeśakālakavibhir yāvatyo varṇayituṃ śakyante tāvatīḥ kathāḥ siṣeve ācacāra /
GP10bhpc101u:1152: na cedam adharmamātraṃ kalañja-bhakṣaṇādivat kintu mahāsāhasam ity āha-paradārābhimarśanam iti //BhPC_10,33.28//
GP10bhpc101u:1155: kim abhiprāya etan naḥ saṃśayaṃ chindhi suvrata //
GP10bhpc101u:1156: āptakāmasya nāyam adharma iti ced yady evaṃ kāmābhāvān ninditaṃ kenābhiprāyeṇa kṛtavān iti pṛcchati-āptakāma iti //BhPC_10,33.29//
GP10bhpc101u:1160: tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ[*87] sarvabhujo yathā //
GP10bhpc101u:1163: parameśvare kaimutikanyāyena parihartuṃ sāmānyato mahatāṃ vṛttam āha-dharmavyatikrama iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1165: tac ca teṣāṃ tejasvināṃ doṣāya na bhavatīti //BhPC_10,33.30//
GP10bhpc101u:1167: naitat samācarej jātu manasāpi hy anīśvaraḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1168: vinaśyaty ācaran mauḍhyād yathā rudro 'bdhijaṃ viṣam //
GP10bhpc101u:1169: tarhi “yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhaḥ” iti nyāyenānyo 'pi kuryād ity āśaṅkyāha-naitad iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1170: anīśvaro dehādiparatantraḥ yathā rudravyatirikto viṣam ācaran bhakṣayan //BhPC_10,33.31//
GP10bhpc101u:1173: teṣāṃ yat svavacoyuktaṃ buddhimāṃs tat samācaret //
GP10bhpc101u:1174: kathaṃ tarhi sadācārasya prāmāṇyam ata āha-īśvarāṇām iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1178: ataḥ svavacoyuktaṃ teṣāṃ vacasā yadyad yuktam aviruddhaṃ tattad evācaret //BhPC_10,33.32//
GP10bhpc101u:1182: nanu tarhi te 'pi kim evaṃ sāhasam ācaranti tatrāha-kuśaleti /
GP10bhpc101u:1183: prārabdhakarmakṣapaṇamātram eva teṣāṃ kṛtyaṃ nānyad ity arthaḥ //BhPC_10,33.33//
GP10bhpc101u:1187_0: [*88] yadā īśitavyānāṃ niyamyānāṃ nirahaṅkāriṇāṃ jīvānāṃ kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyate
GP10bhpc101u:1187_1: tadā tiryagādirūpāṇām akhilasattvānām īśitur niyantuḥ kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyata
GP10bhpc101u:1187_2: iti kim u vaktavyam iti pūrvaślokasthena “na vidyate” iti padasaṃbandhenānvayaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1189: kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyata iti kiṃ punar vaktavyam ity arthaḥ //BhPC_10,33.34//
GP10bhpc101u:1192: svairaṃ caranti munayo 'pi na nahyamānās tasyecchayāttavapuṣaḥ kuta eva bandhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1193: etad eva sphuṭīkaroti-yasya pādapaṅkajaparāgasya niṣevaṇena tṛptāḥ,
GP10bhpc101u:1194: yadvā yasya pādapaṅkajaparāge niṣevā yeṣāṃ te ca te tṛptāś ceti bhaktā ity arthaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1195: tathā jñāninaś ca na nahyamānā bandhanam aprāptavantaḥ //BhPC_10,33.35//
GP10bhpc101u:1197: gopīnāṃ tatpatīnāṃ ca sarveṣām eva dehinām /
GP10bhpc101u:1200: idānīṃ bhagavataḥ sarvāntaryāmiṇaḥ paradārasevā nāma na kācid ity āha-gopīnām iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1201: yo 'ntaś caraty adhyakṣo buddhyādisākṣī sa eva krīḍanena dehabhāk,
GP10bhpc101u:1202: na tv asmadāditulyo yena doṣaḥ syād iti //BhPC_10,33.36//
GP10bhpc101u:1205: bhajate tādṛśīḥ krīḍā yāḥ śrutvā[*90] tatparo bhavet //
GP10bhpc101u:1208: nanv evaṃ ced āptakāmasya nindite kutaḥ pravṛttir ity ata āha-anugrahāyeti /
GP10bhpc101u:1209: śṛṅgāra-rasākṛṣṭacetaso 'tibahirmukhān api svaparān kartum iti bhāvaḥ //BhPC_10,33.37//
GP10bhpc101u:1211: nāsūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya mohitās tasya māyayā /
GP10bhpc101u:1212: manyamānāḥ svapārśvasthān svān svān dārān vrajaukasaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1213: nanv anye 'pi bhinnācārāḥ svaceṣṭitam evam eveti vadanti tatrāha-nāsūyann iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1214: evaṃbhūtaiśvaryābhāve tathā kurvantaḥ pāpā jñeyā iti bhāvaḥ //BhPC_10,33.38//
GP10bhpc101u:1222: vikrīḍitaṃ vrajavadhūbhir idaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ śraddhānvito 'nuśṛṇuyād atha varṇayed yaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1223: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati pratilabhya kāmaṃ hṛdrogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1224: bhagavataḥ kāmavijayarūparāsakrīḍāśravaṇādeḥ kāmavijayam eva phalam āha-vikrīḍitam iti /
GP10bhpc101u:1225: acireṇa dhīraḥ san hṛdrogaṃ kāmam[*92] āśu apahinoti parityajatīti //BhPC_10,33.40//
GP10bhpc101u:1226: [*92] yadvā kāmaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ āśu bhaktiṃ labdhvā kāmādisarvahṛdrogam acireṇa hinotīty arthaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1229: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **33**
